sentences.en: He confronted his childhood trauma and tried to exorcize the pain.
sentences.cn: 他与童年时代的精神创伤对抗并试图祛除这种痛苦。

sentences.en: She had managed to exorcize these unhappy memories from her mind.
sentences.cn: 她终于把这些不愉快的记忆从头脑中抹掉了。

trans.tran_en: to force evil spirits to leave a place by using special words and ceremonies

trans.tran_cn: （用祈祷等）驱除（恶魔），给（某人、某地）驱除妖魔
